name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy LinkedIn profiles to your CRM and craft personalized messages with AI.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your prospecting and CRM enrichment with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Trello cards or Hubspot contacts from Linkedin profiles in one click.

ProspectBuddy is a simple solution to automate your prospecting and CRM lead nurturing. Copy Linkedin profile information (photo, name, link etc.) directly to your Trello or Hubspot CRM in one click.

Additionally, you can use the profile information of your prospects to craft personalized messages. Prospect Buddy is already integrated with popular GPT models such as OpenAI, Gemini, and Mistral AI (with more to come), allowing you to choose the best messaging solution.

The plugin would be a useful automation tool for any Linkedin prospecting activity. Great solution for business development teams, recruiters and others.

Try for free and contact development team if you need more features to add in the plugin.

Reduce a routine work of your team.
